name: docdash
description: A clean, responsive documentation template theme for JSDoc 3 inspired by lodash and minami

scripts.changes: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && npm run changes:add && npm run changes:commit && npm run changes:push
scripts.changes:commit: if [[ $(git log -1 --pretty=%B) = 'feat'*':'* ]] || [[ $(git log -1 --pretty=%B) = 'fix'*':'* ]]; then git commit --allow-empty -m 'update CHANGELOG: '$(git log -1 --pretty=%B); else git commit --allow-empty -m 'empty commit'; fi

author: Clement Moron <clement.moron@gmail.com>
